service_name: OCSL Service Delivery & Cloud Transition Services
page_content:
OCSL MANAGED SERVICES LIMITED

OCSL Service Delivery & Cloud Transition Services

OCSL provides comprehensive Service Delivery and Cloud Transition services so you can fast track your migration, on time and on budget, from on premise and hosted solutions to cloud based environment through our IaaS, PaaS and SaaS services. We will ensure a smooth/quality/secure transition delivered as business as usual (BAU).

Features

  • Single point of contact, smooth implementation of change.
  • Dedicated/pragmatic/flexible PRINCE2 Practitioner Project Managers tailoring each project.
  • Best practice methodologies including PRINCE2/ ITIL whilst adhering to ISO9001/ISO27001.
  • Standardised processes, procedures, and service level agreements.
  • Strategy/Service design/Service transition/Service operations/Continual service improvement.
  • Performance/Availability/Security/Incident/Problem management & Change management.
  • Full lifecycle risk management programme.
  • Minimising risk to live environments through DevOps/User Acceptance Testing UAC.
  • Impact and go live readiness, pilots and trials management.
  • Enterprise Management, Licence Management, Asset Management, Configuration Management.

Benefits

  • Projects delivered to deadline and budget/ Cost-savings in hardware/ support.
  • Benefit from our experience of leading the complete project life-cycle.
  • Ensure new services, processes and IT meet organisational development needs.
  • Minimise issues in live environments/ensuring services are stable and supportable.
  • The path to service readiness is planned and co-ordinated.
  • Reduced operational and delivery costs/ Increased speed to deliver.
  • Technical transition assurance/Efficiency in transition of services.
  • Smooth transition to cloud based services.
  • Minimise risk by use of RAID based Risk Management techniques.
  • Achievement of value for money with demonstrable and quantifiable benefits.

Pricing

£150 to £1500 per person per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Day
